message.body: SO. My professor picked you! Mr. Spielpalast! He thinks it sounds super interesting and he thinks Burlington is an especially unique market. Would you have any time this week for a little bit longer of a phone chat? We can plan something out?

Also I'll be coming to burly march 14th and staying for a couple days. Conveniently with the girl who's been assigned to work with me too. So if phone calls are too hard to arrange we can all just meet in person!
Awesome! I think Thursday night would be best
